en_us: Adds the 'Percurro' Shamir to Metallurgy! Weapons with Percurro let you teleport past your enemies in the blink of an eye!
Percurro teleports the user behind their target when attacking.

The Percurro Shamir is found on Curie's Bismium Bands. It can be placed onto swords, axes, and tridents.\n\nAttacking a mob teleports the user up to 6 blocks behind the target, turning to face the target.
